languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, разрешите доложить: мы проводили зачистку территории после нападения. Были арестованы или устранены все убийцы, кроме одного..." {n}Офицер зло кривится.{/n} "Он заперся внутри, уже ранил двоих, кто пытался подобраться к нему. Но можете не беспокоиться — мы вот-вот потравим его и вычистим усадьбу от этой грязи до конца".

traits.locale_text: "Ваше Благородие, разрешите доложить: мы проводили зачистку территории после нападения. Были арестованы или устранены все убийцы, кроме одного..." {n}Офицер зло кривится.{/n} "Он заперся в доме, уже ранил двоих, кто пытался подобраться к нему. Но можете не беспокоиться — мы вот-вот выкурим его и вычистим усадьбу от этой грязи до конца".

languages.text: "Ready to report, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We conducted a sweep of the area after the attack. All of the assassins were arrested or neutralised except for one..." {n}The officer scowls darkly.{/n} "He's sealed himself inside. He already injured two wardens who tried to reach him. But there's no need to worry — we'll poison him and clear the last dregs of dirt from the estate."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, разрешите доложить: мы проводили зачистку территории после нападения. Были арестованы или устранены все убийцы, кроме одного..." {n}Офицер зло кривится.{/n} "Он заперся внутри, уже ранил двоих, кто пытался подобраться к нему. Но можете не беспокоиться — мы вот-вот потравим его и вычистим усадьбу от этой грязи до конца".

All of the assassins were arrested or neutralized except for one..." {n}The officer scowls darkly.{/n} "He's sealed himself in the building. He already injured two guards who tried to reach him. But there's no need to worry — we'll poison him and clear the last dregs of dirt from the estate."

All of the assassins were arrested or neutralised except for one..." {n}The officer scowls darkly.{/n} "He's sealed himself inside. He already injured two wardens who tried to reach him. But there's no need to worry — we'll poison him and clear the last dregs of dirt from the estate."

languages.text: 「ご報告します、陛下。襲撃を受けてこの辺りをしらみ潰しに調査しました。一人を除いて、暗殺者の全員は逮捕もしくは無力化されました…」{n}将校は顔をしかめて険悪な表情を作っている。{/n}「暗殺者は中に立てこもっています。奴を捕らえようとしたワーデン二体がすでに負傷しましたが、心配は無用です。我々が奴を毒殺し、屋敷から最後のゴミくずを掃除いたします」
languages.original_text: "Ready to report, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We conducted a sweep of the area after the attack. All of the assassins were arrested or neutralised except for one..." {n}The officer scowls darkly.{/n} "He's sealed himself inside. He already injured two wardens who tried to reach him. But there's no need to worry — we'll poison him and clear the last dregs of dirt from the estate."

traits.locale_text: 「ご報告します、陛下。襲撃を受けてこの辺りをしらみ潰しに調査しました。一人を除いて、暗殺者の全員は逮捕もしくは無力化されました…」{n}将校は顔をしかめて険悪な表情を作っている。{/n}「暗殺者は中に立てこもっています。奴を捕らえようとしたワーデン二体がすでに負傷しましたが、心配は無用です。我々が奴を毒殺し、屋敷から最後のゴミくずを掃除いたします」

languages.text: “向您报告，大人。袭击发生之后，我们扫荡了这片地区。所有参加刺杀的人员都已经消灭或逮捕，但还剩一个……”{n}军官阴沉着脸。{/n}“他把自己锁在里面，已经打伤了两名打算接近他的守卫。不过不用担心，我们打算毒死他，彻底消灭这座庄园里最后的污垢。”
languages.original_text: "Ready to report, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We conducted a sweep of the area after the attack. All of the assassins were arrested or neutralised except for one..." {n}The officer scowls darkly.{/n} "He's sealed himself inside. He already injured two wardens who tried to reach him. But there's no need to worry — we'll poison him and clear the last dregs of dirt from the estate."

traits.locale_text: “向您报告，大人。袭击发生之后，我们扫荡了这片地区。所有参加刺杀的人员都已经消灭或逮捕，但还剩一个……”{n}军官阴沉着脸。{/n}“他把自己锁在里面，已经打伤了两名打算接近他的守卫。不过不用担心，我们打算毒死他，彻底消灭这座庄园里最后的污垢。”

languages.text: «Vengo a informar, {mf|milord|milady}. Hemos peinado la zona después del atentado. Todos los asesinos han sido arrestados o reducidos menos uno...». {n}El oficial frunce el ceño.{/n} «Está atrincherado dentro. Ha herido a dos guardias que intentaron acercarse a él. Pero no hay problema ninguno; le envenenaremos y purgaremos las últimas máculas de la mansión».
languages.original_text: "Ready to report, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We conducted a sweep of the area after the attack. All of the assassins were arrested or neutralised except for one..." {n}The officer scowls darkly.{/n} "He's sealed himself inside. He already injured two wardens who tried to reach him. But there's no need to worry — we'll poison him and clear the last dregs of dirt from the estate."

traits.locale_text: «Vengo a informar, {mf|milord|milady}. Hemos peinado la zona después del atentado. Todos los asesinos han sido arrestados o reducidos menos uno...». {n}El oficial frunce el ceño.{/n} «Está atrincherado dentro. Ha herido a dos guardias que intentaron acercarse a él. Pero no hay problema ninguno; le envenenaremos y purgaremos las últimas máculas de la mansión».

languages.text: "Erstatte Bericht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Wir haben nach dem Angriff eine Durchsuchung des Bereichs durchgeführt. Alle Attentäter wurden verhaftet oder neutralisiert, bis auf einen ..." {n}Der Offizier blickt finster drein.{/n} "Er hat sich drinnen verschanzt. Er hat schon zwei Wächter verwundet, die sich ihm nähern wollten. Aber es besteht kein Anlass zur Sorge – wir werden ihn vergiften und sämtliche Schmutzreste aus dem Anwesen entfernen."
languages.original_text: "Ready to report, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We conducted a sweep of the area after the attack. All of the assassins were arrested or neutralised except for one..." {n}The officer scowls darkly.{/n} "He's sealed himself inside. He already injured two wardens who tried to reach him. But there's no need to worry — we'll poison him and clear the last dregs of dirt from the estate."

traits.locale_text: "Erstatte Bericht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Wir haben nach dem Angriff eine Durchsuchung des Bereichs durchgeführt. Alle Attentäter wurden verhaftet oder neutralisiert, bis auf einen ..." {n}Der Offizier blickt finster drein.{/n} "Er hat sich drinnen verschanzt. Er hat schon zwei Wächter verwundet, die sich ihm nähern wollten. Aber es besteht kein Anlass zur Sorge – wir werden ihn vergiften und sämtliche Schmutzreste aus dem Anwesen entfernen."

languages.text: « Je vais vous faire un compte rendu de la situation, Votre Seigneurie. Nous avons passé la zone au peigne fin après l'attaque et tous les terroristes ont été arrêtés ou neutralisés, sauf un, {n}explique l'officier en fronçant les sourcils.{/n} Il s'est enfermé à l'intérieur. Il a déjà blessé deux gardiens qui ont essayé de le déloger, mais pas d'inquiétude... Nous allons l'enfumer à l'insecticide pour mettre fin à cette infestation de vermine dans le domaine. »
languages.original_text: "Ready to report, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We conducted a sweep of the area after the attack. All of the assassins were arrested or neutralised except for one..." {n}The officer scowls darkly.{/n} "He's sealed himself inside. He already injured two wardens who tried to reach him. But there's no need to worry — we'll poison him and clear the last dregs of dirt from the estate."

traits.locale_text: « Je vais vous faire un compte rendu de la situation, Votre Seigneurie. Nous avons passé la zone au peigne fin après l'attaque et tous les terroristes ont été arrêtés ou neutralisés, sauf un, {n}explique l'officier en fronçant les sourcils.{/n} Il s'est enfermé à l'intérieur. Il a déjà blessé deux gardiens qui ont essayé de le déloger, mais pas d'inquiétude... Nous allons l'enfumer à l'insecticide pour mettre fin à cette infestation de vermine dans le domaine. »

languages.text: "Rapor vermeye hazırız {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Saldırı sonrasında bölgede bir temizlik operasyonu gerçekleştirdik. Tüm suikastçılar tutuklandı veya etkisiz hâle getirildi. Biri hariç." {n}Subay belli belirsiz kaş çatıyor.{/n} "Kendisini içeri kilitledi. Ona ulaşmaya çalışan iki dizdarı yaraladı ama endişe edecek bir şey yok. Onu zehirleyecek, böylece konaktaki son pisliği de temizlemiş olacağız."
languages.original_text: "Ready to report, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We conducted a sweep of the area after the attack. All of the assassins were arrested or neutralised except for one..." {n}The officer scowls darkly.{/n} "He's sealed himself inside. He already injured two wardens who tried to reach him. But there's no need to worry — we'll poison him and clear the last dregs of dirt from the estate."

traits.locale_text: "Rapor vermeye hazırız {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Saldırı sonrasında bölgede bir temizlik operasyonu gerçekleştirdik. Tüm suikastçılar tutuklandı veya etkisiz hâle getirildi. Biri hariç." {n}Subay belli belirsiz kaş çatıyor.{/n} "Kendisini içeri kilitledi. Ona ulaşmaya çalışan iki muhafızı yaraladı ama endişe edecek bir şey yok. Onu zehirleyecek, böylece konaktaki son pisliği de temizlemiş olacağız."
